achievements.name: Teamwork Novice
achievements.description: Answer 5 teamwork questions with at least an 'Average' rating

achievements.name: Teamwork Expert
achievements.description: Answer 10 teamwork questions with at least a 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Teamwork Master
achievements.description: Answer 15 teamwork questions with at least 3 'Excellent' ratings

achievements.name: Analytical Novice
achievements.description: Answer 5 analytical skills questions with at least an 'Average' rating

achievements.name: Analytical Expert
achievements.description: Answer 10 analytical skills questions with at least a 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Analytical Master
achievements.description: Answer 15 analytical skills questions with at least 3 'Excellent' ratings

achievements.name: Results-Driven Novice
achievements.description: Answer 5 drive for results questions with at least an 'Average' rating

achievements.name: Results-Driven Expert
achievements.description: Answer 10 drive for results questions with at least a 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Results-Driven Master
achievements.description: Answer 15 drive for results questions with at least 3 'Excellent' ratings

achievements.name: Presentation Novice
achievements.description: Answer 5 presentation skills questions with at least an 'Average' rating

achievements.name: Presentation Expert
achievements.description: Answer 10 presentation skills questions with at least a 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Presentation Master
achievements.description: Answer 15 presentation skills questions with at least 3 'Excellent' ratings

achievements.name: Markets Novice
achievements.description: Answer 5 technical markets questions with at least an 'Average' rating

achievements.name: Markets Expert
achievements.description: Answer 10 technical markets questions with at least a 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Markets Master
achievements.description: Answer 15 technical markets questions with at least 3 'Excellent' ratings

achievements.name: Consistency Champion
achievements.description: Practice for 5 consecutive days

achievements.name: Culture Connoisseur
achievements.description: Complete the JP Morgan culture quiz with at least 90% accuracy

achievements.name: Interview Ready
achievements.description: Complete at least 3 full interview simulations with an average 'Good' rating

achievements.name: Feedback Master
achievements.description: Improve your rating on 10 questions after reviewing feedback

achievements.name: Speed Thinker
achievements.description: Successfully answer 5 questions in timed mode under 3 minutes each

levels.name: Interview Novice
levels.description: Just starting your JP Morgan interview preparation journey

levels.name: JP Morgan Candidate
levels.description: Ready for your JP Morgan interview

levels.name: JP Morgan Prospect
levels.description: Positioned as a strong JP Morgan candidate

levels.name: Future Analyst
levels.description: Demonstrating the qualities of a JP Morgan analyst

dailyChallenges.name: Behavioral Blitz
dailyChallenges.description: Answer 5 behavioral questions from different competency areas with at least a 'Good' rating

dailyChallenges.name: Technical Deep Dive
dailyChallenges.description: Answer 3 advanced technical questions with at least a 'Good' rating

dailyChallenges.name: Speed Round
dailyChallenges.description: Answer 10 questions in under 30 minutes with at least an 'Average' rating

dailyChallenges.name: Excellence Pursuit
dailyChallenges.description: Achieve an 'Excellent' rating on 3 questions from different categories

dailyChallenges.name: Weakness Focus
dailyChallenges.description: Improve your rating on 3 questions from your lowest-performing competency area

dailyChallenges.name: Culture Connection
dailyChallenges.description: Answer 5 questions while explicitly connecting your responses to JP Morgan's culture and values

dailyChallenges.name: Simulation Success
dailyChallenges.description: Complete a full interview simulation with an average 'Good' rating

streakBonuses.description: 7-Day Streak: A full week of preparation!

interviewModes.name: Practice Mode
interviewModes.description: Take your time to craft thoughtful responses with no time pressure

interviewModes.name: Timed Mode
interviewModes.description: Practice answering questions under time constraints (3 minutes per question)
features: Bonus points for quick, quality answers

interviewModes.name: Interview Simulation
interviewModes.description: Experience a full JP Morgan interview with mixed questions and realistic timing

interviewModes.name: Weakness Targeting
interviewModes.description: Focus specifically on your lowest-performing competency areas

interviewModes.name: Daily Challenge
interviewModes.description: Complete a unique daily challenge for bonus points

progressMilestones.name: Competency Explorer
progressMilestones.description: Answer at least one question from each competency area

progressMilestones.name: Simulation Survivor
progressMilestones.description: Complete your first full interview simulation

progressMilestones.name: Improvement Journey
progressMilestones.description: Improve your rating on a question after reviewing feedback

messages: Your interview skills are growing! Welcome to level {level}: {level_name}!
New achievement: {achievement_name}! {points} points added to your score!
You've earned the {achievement_name} achievement! Keep up the great work!
Your dedication is paying off! {streak_description} Enjoy {points} bonus points!
Outstanding! Your answer received an 'Excellent' rating!
Exceptional response! That's exactly what JP Morgan is looking for!
Brilliant answer! You've demonstrated the qualities of a top JP Morgan candidate!
You're improving! Your rating on this question has increased from {old_rating} to {new_rating}!
Progress alert! You've improved from {old_rating} to {new_rating} on this question!
Your hard work is paying off! Your rating has improved from {old_rating} to {new_rating}!
